title: Chandrika Ratna Jhumka - Delicate Sapphire & Rose Quartz Earrings
materials: Cubic Zirconia. Features the distinctive Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: These elegant Jhumka earrings blend traditional South Indian aesthetics with a modern design sensibility. The rose quartz at the top showcases a subtle radiance, while the pear-shaped sapphire pendant below adds a touch of regal charm. Both stones are meticulously surrounded by a delicate halo of CZ stones set in a intricate filigree gold frame, giving it a contemporary update to the classic Jhumka style.
occasions: Perfect for both traditional events like weddings (Veedhi Utsavam)
and contemporary gatherings. Elevate your look for office parties
description: These Chandrika Ratna Jhumkas offer a unique blend of tradition and modernity. The superior craftsmanship guarantees durability, while the carefully selected gemstones exude sophistication. The design honors South Indian jewelry traditions while remaining versatile enough for contemporary styles. A timeless investment that will be cherished for years to come.
